alert.note: Alert for Benton; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tippah and northern Benton Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 454 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lamar, or 12 miles northeast of Holly Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lamar, Snow Lake Shores, Canaan, Michigan City, Gravestown, Walnut, Ashland, Brody, Whitten Town, Hamilton and New Canaan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
